member.summary: Imports the type specified by . When a single class with a public parameterless constructor is found that implements or inherits from , then an instance of that class will be created and passed to the parameter callback.
member.typeparam: The type to import. An object of this type will be passed to the parameter callback.
member.param: A callback function to invoke when an implementation of is created.

When a single class with a public parameterless constructor is found that implements or inherits from either or , then an instance of that class is created. If that instance is a , than that instance will be passed to the callback. If the instance is a , then an instance of is obtained by using the function and passed to the callback.
member.typeparam: The type to import. An object of this type will be passed to the parameter callback.
A type that exposes a method or property that can be invoked to obtain an instance of .
member.param: A callback function to invoke when an implementation of is created.
A function used to obtain an instance of by using an instance of .
The name of this import operation. If not null, exported classes without a matching name are excluded.
The import options to use. If null or not provided, the value returned by is returned.

member.param: A callback function to invoke when an implementation of is created.

If an instance is a , then an instance of is obtained by using the function and passed to the callback.

member.name: P:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ExportInfo.Priority
member.summary: Gets the priority of the export, relative to the priority of other exports. The default value, if not specified in the constructor is negative one. This value is used during import operations to sort the discovered classes.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the export. This value is compared against the name parameter in various import operations.

member.name: P:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ExportInfo.Disabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the type indicated by should be excluded from consideration during an import operation.

member.name: T:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ImportOptions
member.summary: Defines various options for an import operation.

member.name: M:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ImportOptions.GetDefaultDirectoryPaths
member.summary: Returns an array containing a single element: the value returned by AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory.

member.name: M:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ImportOptions.GetDefaultExportComparer
member.summary: Gets a new instance of .

member.name: P:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ImportOptions.AllowNonPublicClasses
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow non-public classes to be imported. Default value is false, indicating that only public classes will be included in an import operation.

member.name: P:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ImportOptions.IncludeNamedExportsFromUnnamedImports
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a named export will be included from an unnamed import operation. Default value is false, indicating that named exports will not be used given an unnamed import.

member.name: P:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ImportOptions.PreferTTargetType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether, given equal priorities, an implementation of TTargetType will be chosen over an implementation of TFactoryType. Default value is false, indicating that TFactoryType will be preferred.

member.name: P:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ImportOptions.IncludeTypesFromThisAssembly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether types that are defined in this assembly should be considered from an import operation. Default value is false, indicating that types defined in this assembly will be excluded.

member.name: P:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ImportOptions.DirectoryPaths
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory paths that are searched for an import operation. If not set, or set to null, the value returned will contain a single element: the value returned by AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory.

member.name: P:Rock.Rock.StaticDependencyInjection.ImportOptions.ExportComparer
member.summary: Gets or sets a comparer to be used to differentiate between multiple exports with the same priority. If not set, or set to null, the value returned will be a comparer that sorts based on the assembly qualified name of the target class.

member.name: T:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1
member.summary:
Represents a "semimutable" value. Its value can be changed either via the setter of the property, or by calling the method. However, once the getter of the property is accessed or the method is called, the value will never change again.
It's like Schrdinger's cat - once you open the box, the cat's fate is sealed.
member.typeparam: The type of the value.

member.name: M:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: Calls with parameters: the value of default(T); and the value of .

member.name: M:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.#ctor(`0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The default value.
Whether this instance of can be unlocked after it has been locked.
member.remarks: Calls with parameters: a function that returns ; and the value of .

member.name: M:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.#ctor(System.Func{`0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A function that returns the default value.
Whether this instance of can be unlocked after it has been locked.

member.name: M:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.ResetValue
member.summary: Sets the property to this instance's original default value.

member.name: M:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.LockValue
member.summary: Locks the property and prevents any further changes from being accepted.

member.name: M:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.UnlockValue
member.summary: Unlocks the property, allowing changes to be accepted. If the value of the property is false, then this method does nothing.
member.remarks: This method should not be used "in production". It's main use is to help facilitate testing.

member.name: M:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.SetValue(System.Func{`0})
member.summary: Sets the value of the property using a function that will not be evaluated until either the property is accessed (the getter), or the method is called.
member.param: A function whose return value is used to set the property.

member.name: P:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the semimutable object. The setter can be called multiple times, but only the last value "wins". Once the getter is called (or the method is called), the value is "locked" - any value passed to the setter is ignored from this point forward.

member.name: P:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.CanUnlock
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance can be unlocked.

member.name: P:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.IsLocked
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is locked.

member.name: P:Rock.Immutable.Semimutable`1.HasDefaultValue
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance has (or will have) the default value.

member.name: T:Rock.Reflection.SlowFactory
member.summary: Provides unoptimized mechanisms for creating instances of types.

member.name: M:Rock.Reflection.SlowFactory.CreateInstance``1(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the type represented by , cast to . If a type cannot be located, if the type is not assignable to , or if the type does not have a suitable constructor, an exception is thrown. Suitable constructors include public parameterless constructors, and constructors whose parameters all have a default value.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to return.
member.param: The assembly qualified name of the type to create.
member.returns: An instance of the type represented by .

member.name: T:Rock.Threading.SoftLock
member.summary: An object that enables exclusive access to critical sections of code. Unlike a true lock, where a thread will block while another thread has the lock, a "soft lock" will cause a thread to skip over a critical section of code if another thread has the lock.

member.name: M:Rock.Threading.SoftLock.TryAcquire
member.summary: Try to acquire the lock. Returns true if the lock is acquired. Returns false if the lock has already been acquired.
member.returns: True, if the lock was acquired. False, if another thread currently has the lock

member.name: M:Rock.Threading.SoftLock.Release
member.summary: Release the lock. Should only be called after successfully acquiring the lock.

member.name: P:Rock.Threading.SoftLock.IsLockAcquired
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the lock has been acquired.

member.name: T:Rock.DependencyInjection.AutoContainer
member.summary: An implementation of that registers, at constructor-time, a collection of object instances. When the or methods are called, these instances are available to be passed as a constructor arguments if the instance satisfies the constructor arg's contract.

member.name: M:Rock.DependencyInjection.IResolver.MergeWith(Rock.DependencyInjection.IResolver)
member.summary: Returns a new instance of that is the result of a merge operation between this instance of and .
member.param: A secondary .
member.returns: An instance of resulting from the merge operation.
member.remarks: Implementors of this method should return an instance of that attempts to resolve via this instance of before attempting to resolve from , recursively. It should set up the relationship such that the resulting has access to , but not the other way around - shouldn't "know" about this instance of or the that is returned by this method.

member.name: M:Rock.DependencyInjection.AutoContainer.#ctor(Rock.DependencyInjection.AutoContainer)
member.summary: Copy constructor. Initializes an instance of an inheritor of to have the same values for its private backing fields as . NOTE: The fields that are copied are the fields defined in in the class. In other words, fields defined in an inheritor of will not be copied by this constructor.

member.name: M:Rock.DependencyInjection.AutoContainer.#ctor(System.Object[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of , using the as its registered dependencies. These depenendencies will be resolvable by this instance of via any type that exactly one dependency equals, implements, or inherits from. This instance of will use internally to determine which constructor of an arbitrary type will be selected for invocation when or methods are called.
member.param: The objects to use as registered dependencies.

member.param: An object that determines which constructor should be used when creating an instance of a type. If null, the value of the property is used.
The objects to use as registered dependencies.
